backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a dairy marketplace backend with product management (add, list) and shopping cart operations (add, remove, clear, get, checkout) using Map and List data structures, keyed by Principal for user-specific carts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: product catalog, shopping cart, checkout process, mobile responsiveness, and farm-inspired visual theme, with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing React components, pages, hooks, routing, and styling for the dairy marketplace application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system with farm-inspired natural tones for light and dark modes, including custom CSS variables for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with four routes (catalog, cart, checkout, confirmation) wrapped in a layout with header, footer, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart component displaying cart items with total price calculation, empty state with call-to-action, and checkout navigation button.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Individual cart item component with product image, quantity controls (increase/decrease/remove), price display, and mutation handling with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters based on hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header component with logo, cart icon showing item count, and responsive mobile/desktop menus using Sheet component.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, name, description, and price with an 'Add to Cart' button that shows success feedback.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Grid layout component that fetches and displays all products using ProductCard components, with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching products, cart data, cart total, and mutations for adding/removing items and checkout operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom farm-inspired color palette for light/dark modes and base styling for touch-friendly UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page with back navigation button and Cart component wrapper in a centered layout.
frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx: Main catalog page with hero banner section and ProductGrid displaying all available dairy products.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with order summary and delivery information form that processes orders and navigates to confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page component that displays a success message with a checkmark icon, order details, and a button to continue shopping.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, typography, animations, and plugins for the dairy marketplace application.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the dairy marketplace application's features, requirements, and architectural notes including product catalog, shopping cart, checkout, and mobile-responsive design.
